metadata.name: itsalwaysyourfault
metadata.description:
Danny Watts  
raregemsfromsoiledhands 

- itsalwaysyourfault  
- asongimadeaftermypops  
- asongimadeoutofenvy

these songs were hard lessons that I’ve learned along the way. my homie Loocy Lex once coined my songs as “rare gems from soiled hands” and that always resonated in my spirit. 

I’ve been through the mud and my hands were there writing about it all. 

Here’s are 3 gems I’ve collected in my life thus far:

1. Nobody got life figured out. we all just making it up as we go.  
2. Don’t take your relationships for granted. Be sure to capture a memory with every loved one. 
3. Depend on yourself always. Look inward to find ways to become better.

Credits:

itsalwaysyourfault  
	Danny Watts  
	dav

asongimadeaftermypops  
	Danny Watts  
	dav  
	48th St  
	EPT
